did.unittitle: Kurt Richard Grossmann Papers

physdesc.extent: 61 manuscript boxes, 6 oversize boxes, 1 card file box, 1 envelope, and 1 motion picture film reel

did.abstract: Writings, correspondence, clippings, and serial issues, relating to Jewish refugees from Nazi Germany, postwar German and Austrian restitution payments to Jewish war victims, German-Israeli relations, the conditions of Jews throughout the world, and civil liberties in the United States and Germany.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Boxes 1-68 closed; microfilm use copy available.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Kurt Richard Grossmann Papers, [Box no.], Hoover Institution Archives.

chronitem.event: General Secretary, Deutsche Liga fuer Menschenrechte.
Participated in effort to nominate Carl von Ossietzky for the Nobel Peace Prize.
Author, Peace and the German Problem.
Co-author (with Arieh Tartakower), The Jewish Refugee.
Author, Die unbesungenen Helden (The unsung heroes).

eventgrp.event: Co-editor and contributor, <title render="italic">Der Friede: Festgabe fuer Adolf Leschnitzer </title>(Peace: presentation for Adolf Leschnitzer).
U.S. correspondent for <title render="italic">Vorwaerts, </title>publication of the Sozialdemokratische Partei Deutschlands, and other newspapers in Europe and Israel.

chronitem.event: Author, Ossietzky: ein deutscher Patriot (Ossietzky: a German patriot), awarded the Albert Schweitzer book prize.
Author, Die Ehrenschuld: Kurzgeschichte der Wiedergutmachung (Debt of honor: short history of restitution).
Author, Emigration: Geschichte der Hitler Fluechtlinge, 1933-1945 (Emigration: history of the refugees from Hitler's Germany).

Co-editor and contributor, Gegenwart im Rueckblick: Festgabe fuer die juedische Gemeinde zu Berlin 25 Jahre nach dem Neubeginn (The present in retrospect: presentation for the Jewish community in Berlin 25 years after its re-establishment).
Participated in effort to nominate Willy Brandt for the Nobel Peace Prize.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Writings, correspondence, clippings, and serial issues, relating to Jewish refugees from Nazi Germany, postwar German and Austrian restitution payments to Jewish war victims, German-Israeli relations, the conditions of Jews throughout the world, and civil liberties in the United States and Germany.

SPEECHES AND WRITINGS,

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Drafts and printed copies of articles, speeches, and books written by or edited by Kurt R. Grossmann, arranged alphabetically by title.

"Adolf Leschnitzer - 60 Jahre," (A. L. 60 years old), Aufbau, Typescript and printed copy.
"Agnew gegen Goodell, der Zug nach rechts," (Agnew vs. Goodell, the shift to the right), Typescript (carbon copy).
"Aktion Suehnezeichen-Erlebnis, Berichte junger Deutscher," (The Aktion Suehnzeichen experience, reports of young Germans), Aufbau, Printed copy.

"Albert John Luthuli und Carl von Ossietzky," Typescript (carbon copies).

"America the Beautiful?" Jedioth Chadashoth, Typescript and printed copy.
"Amerika im Zeichen der Gewalt," (America in the thrall of violence), Tagwacht, Printed copy.
"Amerika steuert in die schwerste innere Krise," (America steering through the most severe inner crisis), Jedioth Chadashoth, Printed copy.
"Amerika und Nixon's Krieg," (America and Nixon's war), Tagwacht, Printed copy.
"Das amerikanische Dilemma," Vorwaerts, Printed copy.
"Das amerikanische Judentum und das moderne Deutschland," (American Jews and modern Germany), Typescript.

"Amerikas Studenten sind eine politische Belastung," (America's students are a political liability), Jedioth Chadashoth, Printed copy.
"Amnestie fuer Deserteure?" Jedioth Chadashoth, Printed copy.
"Der Amsterdamer Weltkongress gegen den imperialistischen Krieg," (The Amsterdam World Congress vs. imperialistic war), Die Friedenswarte,
"Analyse der Entschaedigungsstatistik," Die Mahnung, Printed copy.
"Analyse der 1970er Wahlen," (Analysis of the 1970 elections), Tagwacht,
"Das andere Deutschland, Anmerkungen zum Besuch des Bundespraesidenten in Amerika," (The other Germany, comments on the visit of the German President to America), Neue Presse, Printed copy.
"Aendern die USA ihre Richtung?" (Is the US changing direction?) Tagwacht, Typescript and printed copy.
"Die Anderson Enthuellungen," (The Anderson revelations), Jodioth Chadashoth, Typescript and printed copy.

"Angeklagter in einem Diktaturstaat," (The accused in a dictatorship), Aufbau,

"Anti-Semitism in the Last Two Decades: Germany and Western Europe," Typescript (carbon copy).

"Die Antragsfrist Dezember 1969," (The deadline for processing applications, December 1969), Aufbau, Printed copies.
"Die Antwort der Juden an Adenauer," (The Jews' answer to Adenauer), Allgemeine, Duesseldorf,
"Apollo 15 fuer die USA zu teuer?" (Is Apollo 15 too expensive for the US?), Tagwacht, Typescript and printed copy.
"Arab Propaganda Boomerang," press release, The Jewish Agency, Mimeographed copies.
"Arroganz der Macht und Frieden," (The arrogance of power and peace), Tagwacht, Printed copy.
"Aerzte und Verfolgte," (Doctors and the persecuted), Aufbau, Printed copy.

"Attica, Symptom einer Krankheit," (Attica, symptom of a disease), Tagwacht, Typescript and printed copy.

"Auch Rechtskandidaten sind Referendare," (Even law graduates are officials), Aufbau, Printed copies.
"Auch Washington wurde schuldig," (Even Washington was guilty), Der Ausweg, Typescript and printed copies.

"Auf dem Mond waere genuegend Platz, aber...Nixon und die drohende Bevoelkerungs-explosion," (There would be enough room on the moon, but...Nixon and the threatening population explosion), Jedioth Chadashoth,
"Auf dem Wege zu einer umfassenden Krankenkassenversicherung?" (On the way to a comprehensive health insurance), Typescript (carbon copy).
"Aufbau," (reconstruction), Typescript notes.
"Die Augen des Grossen Bruders," (The eyes of Big Brother), Vorwaerts, Printed copy.
"Aus Angst gemordet," (Murdering out of fear), Typescript (carbon copy).

"Auschwitz und die Sache der Bruederlichkeit," (Auschwitz and the matter of brotherhood), Typescript (carbon copy).

"Auszug der Intelligenz," (Departure of the educated), Rheinischer Merkur, Typescript and printed copies.
"Axel Springer fuer die Pax Americana," Typescript (carbon copy).

"The Basis of the Hague Negotiations," New Yorker Staatszeitung, Reprint.

"Wirtschaftliche Probleme in USA," (Economic problems in the US), Tagwacht, Printed copy.
"Wolken am deutschen Himmel?" (Clouds in the German sky?), Tagwacht, Printed copy.
"Ein Zeichner der Zeit," (An artist of the time), Aufbau, Printed copy.
"Die Zeit ist ueber sie hinweggegangen, die Bundestagsdebatte ueber das Schlussgesetz," (Time has passed them by, debate in parliament on the final law) Aufbau, Printed copy.
"Zerstoerte Hoffnungen, Tragoedien der Wiedergutmachung," (Dashed hopes, tragedies of restitution), Aufbau, Printed copy.
"Zeugnisse der Menschlichkeit, warum ich Die unbesungenen Helden schrieb," (Documents of human kindness, why I wrote The Unsung Heroes), Telegraf, Typescript and printed copies.
"Zionists and Non-Zionists Under the Nazi Rule in the 1930's," Herzl Year Book, Printed copy.
"Zukunft und Gegenwart des Engschaedigungs-programs," (Present and future of the restitution program), Printed copy.

"Zum Nachteil veraendert? Ein Beobachter aus Amerika berichtet von einer Reise durch die Bundesrepublik," (Changed for the worse? An Observer from America reports on a trip through West Germany), Rheinischer Merkur, Printed copy.
"Zum siebzigsten Geburtstag von Adolf Leschnitzer," (On the 70th birthday of A. L.), Aufbau, Printed copy.
"Zum Tode von Marcel Schulte," (On the death of M.S.), Aufbau, Printed copy.
"Zur Problematik der KZ Liste," (On the problems of the camplist), Aufbau, Printed copy.
"Zwanzig Jahre Kampf fuer die Menschenrechte," (Twenty year struggle for human rights), Types cript and carbon copy.
"Zweimal Amerika, die USA zerfallen in zwei Gesellschaften," (US is dividing into two societies), Vorwaerts, Printed copy.

"Der zweitschwerste Posten, J.V. Lindsay kaempft hart um seine Wiederwahl Buergermeister von N.Y.," (The second most difficult job, J.V.L. fights hard for his reelection as mayor of N.Y.), Vorwaerts, Printed copy.
